name: R5_v2_0356_for_R4B
title: Cross-version VS for R5.Hl7VSAlternateCharacterSetHandlingScheme for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0356|2.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R5 to R4B.

concept.display: This standard is titled "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique". .
The character set switching mode specified in HL7 2.5, section 2.7.2 and section 2.A.46, "XPN - extended person name".
This is the default, indicating that there is no character set switching occurring in this message.

contains.display: This standard is titled "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique". .
